text: Jon Ayres Cisky (born September 6, 1941) is an American former politician in the state of Michigan. A native of Saginaw, Michigan, Cisky was a professor at Saginaw Valley State University in the Department of Criminal Justice. Cisky is also a former sergeant in the St. Clair County Sheriff Department. In 1984, Cisky founded Crime Stoppers for the State of Michigan.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/8793/jon-cisky#.VGKdp_TF_Zk He served in the Michigan State Senate from 1991 to 1998, serving districts 14 and 33 as a Republican.http://www.michiganvotes.org/Legislator.aspx?ID=49 In 2006, he was granted professor emeritus status at SVSU.http://www.svsu.edu/library/archives/public/Emeriti/docs/cisky_res.pdf He is married with two children. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Michigan state senators Category:Michigan Republicans Category:Saginaw Valley State University faculty
title: Jon Cisky
